descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=4]I'm leaving Skyrim Modding Community, therefore there won't be any support for my mods on Nexus. [/size]
[size=5]Thank you all for supports and endorsements. [/size][/color][/b]



[color=#ffff00]Notice: Read mod description before asking questions. If your question is already answered in the mod description, I will ignore it.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]This is indeed new/updated version of SG female textures and more.[/color]



[color=red][size=5][b]Description[/b][/size][/color]

It includes
* All races female face & body textures
* Custom make-up tint textures
* Optional 2K body textures for weak computers
* Optional smooth (less muscular) body normal map
* Optional wet body specular maps

Depending on your ENB setting and glossiness/specular power of body in armor mesh, you may see slight neck seam.



[color=red][size=5][b]Requirement[/b][/size][/color]

* CBBE or UNP variant body
* Femalehead.nif from Enhanced Character Edit (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?)



[color=red][size=5][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

Manually copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
It's generally in C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim

Or Use NMM installer.



[color=red][size=5][b]Uninstallation[/b][/size][/color]

Just delete any files from this mod.



[color=red][size=5][b] Frequently Asked Questions[/b][/size][/color]

Q. How do I repack the file for NMM if I want to use optional files?
A.
1. Extract the main file and optional file with 7-zip (do not use winrar, it doesn't seem to support 7zip format properly).
2. Grab what you want from optional files and copy & paste them into the main file.
3. Pack the data folder of the main file then rename it to something like "SG female textures Renewal".

Q. Can I use this with other face/body textures?
A. You may try but you will need to know how to blend neck textures. I don't recommend this because details of texture on neck area will be lost if you blend my textures with other textures. However, you can choose to use my color maps with others' normal maps and vice versa.

Q. Why am I getting pixelated make-up tint textures?
A. My custom tint maps are 1k textures forced up-scaling may result in pixelated textures. In SKSE.ini, change iTintTextureResolution value to 1024 instead of 2048.

Q. What mods did you use to create characters in screenshots?
A. I used Enhanced Character Edit for headmesh and The Eyes of Beauty + my custom textures for eyes.

Q. What ENB do you use?
A. My custom ENBs based on various other ENBs available on Nexus. I do not have permission to release them on Nexus, sorry.

Q. What underwear mod are you using?
A. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21324/?

Q. I use CBBE and old women have 4 nippels, what the hell!
A. I forgot to put normal map for old ladies in cbbe file. For now, you just have to re-install basic cbbe normal map texture for femaleold race(!) (or just don't make them naked .. I don't even know why you would want to take clothes off from old ladies). I'll get the updated version up when I have the motivation to do so. Sorry, as I'm long-time UNP user, I don't really get motivated in CBBE support.

Q. Can I upload patch/modified version of SG textures on Nexus or anywhere else?
A. Yes, you can. Current version is the final version of SG textures that is supported by me. For that reason, I welcome anyone who wants to upgrade/modify SG textures. Just let me know where you upload your modifications.



[color=red][size=5][b]Incompatibility[/b][/size][/color]

This mod is only compatible with CBBE, UNP/UNPB and any body that uses same UV map with UNP body.
It is also compatible with Racemenu as well as Enhanced Character Edit.



[color=red][size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]

For awesome unp body textures bases,
DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709)

For head colormap base + body normal map base,
CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554)

For head colormap and freckles texture,
Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents by pikkatze (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971)

For head normal map,
High-Res Female Nord Skin by nuska (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25531)

For wet body specular map,
Sweaty body by HHaleyy (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666)

For body colormap,
Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986)
High Resolution Scars by Xenius (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784)

For Elven race normal map,
Ethereal Elven Overhaul by nuska (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?)

For Subsurface Map,
Subsurface Full Body Map for Coverwomen and UNP UNPB Bodies by MrTroubleMaker (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30050/?)


[color=yellow]Please do not re-distribute or share this file by any means and in any places without my permission. Instead of direct download, a link to this page would be appreciated.
If you want to use my textures in your mod and want to release the mod somewhere, credit me then notify me of your mod after the release. You don't have to contact me to get the permission.[/color]
author: Hello Santa

files.name: SG Textures Renewal Main
files.changelogHtml:
File structures changed for NMM compatibility - main file and optional files are now separated.
Minor change on the number of moles and scars in main body
Added 4K and 2K body textures without scars as optional files

files.name: SG Textures Renewal UNP
files.changelogHtml:
Full CBBE support
Added normal pubic hair option
Re-packed optional files
Fixed green-ish spot on private area on UNP
